caption.title: Schematic diagram of rhein on inhibition of IAV infection and IAV-mediated ALI.
caption.p: Rhein can inhibit IAV adsorption and replication. Rhein suppresses IAV replication by inhibiting IAV-mediated oxidative stress and activations of TLR4, Akt, p38, JNK MAPK, and NF-ÎºB signal pathways. Meanwhile, inhibition of these signal pathways further reduces the production of inflammatory cytokines and MMPs and finally decreases IAV-induced ALI.
